note.p: Daughter of Francis Lawrence Bernard and his wife Mary, of Whitechapel, London. Married Samuel Stutchbury in London in 1820.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/371/14/8/11), 1861 (RG9/1722/124/26)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 October 2017)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 October 2017)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1930 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 October 2017)
